title: 陷入黑暗深渊(Fall into Darkness) Part-1
author: 末影矿工
txt_content:
本帖最后由 末影矿工 于 2014-8-9 14:03 编辑 

------------------------------------------------------------<Fall Into The Darkness>------------------------------------------------------------
        Fall Into The Darkness
                            Part 1:disaster

------------------------------------------------------------<Fall Into The Darkness>------------------------------------------------------------
When you travel this world,mining in the cave,killing all the mobs.You maybe ask:
Who am I,Where am I,Why I'm here......Do not worried,All of your question will be
 answered here.

I still remember that day,I was fishing on the boat.But Then,everything change......
First,There are lightings,thay attacked my village.Then the sky turned to red,It looked 
terrible.I can hear the screams from my village.When I went back to my village,I saw 
everywhere were the skeletals.I heard something was moving behind me,so I turned 
around and saw a bloody skeleton,it tried to kill me.But I killed it with my fishing rod.
When I went home,I didn't found my familys,I only found blood......

I was so scared,I checked everywhere in the village.I found a survivor,he is my Uncle 
Peter,He was dying.
“Uncle!Whats going on here?”I asked.
“...Death...Darkness...Herobrine...”He answered me.
“Who is Herobrine?”I asked again,“Why he did that!”
“Go to find the Master Tay......He live in Viso......He can......”Peter stoped talking,I 
knew he died.I picked up his sword and buried him in the village,and went to find
master Tay.Viso was a small village on the mountain,with many cherry trees.

“Let me kill this Herobrine!”I said.
(Part 1 End)
------------------------------------------------------------<Fall Into The Darkness>------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------<Fall Into The Darkness>------------------------------------------------------------

replies.author: Xiao2
replies.txt_content:
需要度翻
话说有没有中文？

replies.author: Xiao2
replies.txt_content:
当你旅行的时候，这个世界，在洞穴里挖掘，杀死所有的怪物。你可能会问：
我是谁，我在哪里，我为什么在这里......不要担心，你的问题是
这一问题的回答。
我仍然记得那一天，我在船上钓鱼。但后来，一切都改变......
首先，有照明，他们攻击我的村庄。然后，天空变成了红色，看起来
可怕的。我能听到我村的尖叫声。当我回到我的村庄，我看到
到处都是skeletals。我听到有东西在动我的后面，所以我转过身
在看到一个血淋淋的骨架，它试图杀了我。但我杀了我的鱼杆。
当我回家时，我没有找到我的家庭，我只发现血......
我很害怕，我检查了在村子里到处。我发现了一个幸存者，他是我的叔叔
彼得，他死了。
“叔叔！这儿发生什么事了？“我问。
“……死亡……黑暗……herobrine……”他回答我。
“谁是herobrine？“我又问道，“他为什么这样做！“
“去粘找师傅泰......他生活......他可以......”彼得停止说话，我
知道他死了。我捡起他的剑，把他埋葬在村里，去寻找
掌握泰。粘上了山的一个小村庄里，有很多樱花树。
“让我杀了这个herobrine！“我说。
（1年底）
